commits.content:
• Home
  • Features
  • Testimonials
  • Faq
  • About Us

Last updated: September 4, 2025. Please read carefully before using our services.

On This Page

Introduction

Conditions of Use

Privacy Policy

Age Restriction

Intellectual Property

User Accounts

Payments & Transactions

Applicable Law

Disputes

Indemnification

Limitation on Liability

Changes to Terms

Contact

Website Terms and Conditions

Please read these terms and conditions ("terms and conditions", "terms", "T&Cs", "Agreement") carefully before using https://pridesports.in/ ("website", "service") operated by Pridesports ("us", "we", "our").

For purposes of these T&Cs, “you” and “your” refer to the user of the Services, including both parents (clients) and sports academies. If you disagree with any part of these T&Cs, you must discontinue using the platform immediately.

1. Conditions of Use

By using this website, you certify that you have read and reviewed this Agreement and that you agree to comply with its terms. If you do not want to be bound by these terms, please stop using the website immediately. Pridesports grants access only to those who accept these terms.

2. Privacy Policy

Before you continue using our website, we advise you to read our Privacy Policy regarding our user data collection. It will help you better understand our practices.

3. Age Restriction

You must be at least 18 years of age to use this website. By using this website, you warrant that you are at least 18 years old and legally able to adhere to this Agreement. Pridesports assumes no responsibility for liabilities related to age misrepresentation.

4. Intellectual Property

All materials and services provided on this website are the property of Pridesports, its affiliates, directors, officers, employees, agents, suppliers, or licensors, including all copyrights, trademarks, patents, and trade secrets.

You agree not to reproduce or redistribute Pridesports intellectual property in any form. You grant Pridesports a royalty-free and non-exclusive license to display, use, copy, transmit, and broadcast the content you upload. For issues regarding intellectual property claims, please contact us directly.

5. User Accounts

When you register, you agree to provide accurate information and maintain the confidentiality of your login credentials. You are responsible for all activities that occur under your account.

If you suspect a security breach, you must inform us immediately. We reserve the right to terminate accounts, edit or remove content, and cancel services at our discretion.

In case of a data breach originating from Pridesports, we will promptly notify affected users (clients and academies) and take immediate corrective measures.

6. Payments & Transactions

Payments for services occur directly between clients and service providers (sports academies). Pridesports serves only as a platform and does not store payment details. We are not responsible for disputes or issues related to payments between clients and academies.

7. Applicable Law

By using this website, you agree that the laws of India, without regard to conflict of laws, will govern these T&Cs and any disputes that may arise.

8. Disputes

Any dispute related to your use of this website or the services provided by us shall be governed by the courts of India, and you consent to their exclusive jurisdiction.

9. Indemnification

You agree to indemnify Pridesports and hold us harmless against legal claims or demands arising from your use or misuse of our services. We reserve the right to select our own legal counsel.

10. Limitation on Liability

Pridesports is not liable for damages arising from misuse of the website. Specifically, we are not liable for:

  • Disputes between users (clients) and academies.
  • Errors, inaccuracies, or omissions in content provided by users or academies.
  • Breach or failure of third-party payment systems.
  • Service interruptions due to technical or unforeseen issues.

11. Changes to Terms

Pridesports reserves the right to edit, modify, and update these T&Cs at any time. Users will be informed of changes via email. These Terms replace all prior agreements regarding use of the website.

12. Contact Us

If you have questions or concerns about these Terms & Conditions, please contact us at:

Email: contact@pridesports.in

Phone: +91 99539 66978

Mailing Address: G 403 Shanti Vihar, Sector 95, Gurugram, Haryana - 122505
